title: Awesome List Updates on Dec 20, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Dec 20, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Preact
items.content_text:
### Contents / Example Apps

*   [Trellith](https://trellith.sakih.net/) - Tiny Trello Clone PWA ([GitHub Project (⭐13)](https://github.com/sakihet/trellith)).
items.content_html:
Contents / Example Apps

  • Trellith - Tiny Trello Clone PWA (GitHub Project (⭐13)).

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Database Management

*   [Azimutt](https://azimutt.app) - Visual database exploration made for real world databases (big and messy). Explore your database schema as well as data, document them, extend them and even get analysis and guidelines. ([Demo](https://azimutt.app/gallery/gospeak), [Source Code (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/azimuttapp/azimutt)) `MIT` `Elixir/Nodejs/Docker`
*   [WebDB](https://webdb.app) - Efficient database IDE. ([Demo](https://demo.webdb.app/), [Source Code](https://gitlab.com/web-db/app)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`
items.content_html:
Software / Database Management

  • Azimutt - Visual database exploration made for real world databases (big and messy). Explore your database schema as well as data, document them, extend them and even get analysis and guidelines. (Demo, Source Code (⭐1.9k)) MIT Elixir/Nodejs/Docker
  • WebDB - Efficient database IDE. (Demo, Source Code) AGPL-3.0 Docker

items.title: Awesome Cpp
items.content_text:
### Serialization

*   [iguana (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/qicosmos/iguana) - a modern, universal and easy-to-use serialization engine developed in C++20 and C++17. \[Apache2]
items.content_html:
Serialization

  • iguana (⭐1.2k) - a modern, universal and easy-to-use serialization engine developed in C++20 and C++17. [Apache2]

items.title: Ai Collective Tools
items.content_text:
### Image Generator

*   [Ideaogram](https://ideogram.ai/t/trending) - This tool helps us to generate text in an image `#free`
*   [Stable Diffusion Online](https://stablediffusionweb.com/#ai-image-generator) - text-to-image diffusion model capable of generating photo-realistic images given any text input, cultivates autonomous freedom to produce incredible imagery, empowers billions of people to create stunning art within seconds. `#opensource`

### Video Generator

*   [D-ID](https://www.d-id.com/) - D-ID is a platform to generate videos. `#freemium`
items.content_html:
Image Generator

  • Ideaogram - This tool helps us to generate text in an image #free
  • Stable Diffusion Online - text-to-image diffusion model capable of generating photo-realistic images given any text input, cultivates autonomous freedom to produce incredible imagery, empowers billions of people to create stunning art within seconds. #opensource

Video Generator

  • D-ID - D-ID is a platform to generate videos. #freemium

items.title: Awesome Newsletters
items.content_text:
### Python / Svelte

*   [Python Trending Weekly](https://pythoncat.substack.com). A free weekly newsletter featuring noteworthy articles, tutorials, open-source projects, podcasts, videos, trending topics, and more. It is written in Chinese, but most of the shared links come from the English-speaking world.
items.content_html:
Python / Svelte

  • Python Trending Weekly. A free weekly newsletter featuring noteworthy articles, tutorials, open-source projects, podcasts, videos, trending topics, and more. It is written in Chinese, but most of the shared links come from the English-speaking world.

items.title: Awesome R
items.content_text:
### Reproducible Research

*   [targets](https://docs.ropensci.org/targets/) - Make-like pipeline tool for organizing and running data science workflows, automatically skipping steps that have already been done. Supported by [rOpenSci](https://ropensci.org/).
items.content_html:
Reproducible Research

  • targets - Make-like pipeline tool for organizing and running data science workflows, automatically skipping steps that have already been done. Supported by rOpenSci.

items.title: Awesome Generative Deep Art
items.content_text:
### Running LLMs Locally / Prompt Engineering for Text-to-image

*   [PowerInfer (⭐8.2k)](https://github.com/SJTU-IPADS/PowerInfer): a high-speed inference engine for deploying LLMs locally
items.content_html:
Running LLMs Locally / Prompt Engineering for Text-to-image

  • PowerInfer (⭐8.2k): a high-speed inference engine for deploying LLMs locally

items.title: Static Analysis
items.content_text:
### Multiple languages / [Other](#other-1)

*   [pfff (⭐2.4k)](https://github.com/facebookarchive/pfff/wiki/Main) :warning: — Facebook's tools for code analysis, visualizations, or style-preserving source transformation for many languages.
items.content_html:
Multiple languages / Other

  • pfff (⭐2.4k) ⚠️ — Facebook's tools for code analysis, visualizations, or style-preserving source transformation for many languages.

items.title: Awesome Digital History
items.content_text:
### Archives and primary sources / Africa

*   [PARC](https://parc-portal.org/) - Portal for African Research Collections: PARC is the new meta-catalogue for the Africana collections at the research location Basel.

### Archives and primary sources / Global

*   [HMML](https://hmml.org/) - Hill Museum & Manuscript Library. Digital collection of manuscripts from around the world.
items.content_html:
Archives and primary sources / Africa

  • PARC - Portal for African Research Collections: PARC is the new meta-catalogue for the Africana collections at the research location Basel.

Archives and primary sources / Global

  • HMML - Hill Museum & Manuscript Library. Digital collection of manuscripts from around the world.

items.title: Awesome Opentofu
items.content_text:
### Tools / Environment managers

*   [tfswitcher (⭐4)](https://github.com/ASleepyCat/tfswitcher) - Terraform and OpenTofu version switcher written in Rust.
items.content_html:
Tools / Environment managers

  • tfswitcher (⭐4) - Terraform and OpenTofu version switcher written in Rust.

items.title: Awesome Embedded Rust
items.content_text:
### Books, blogs, and training materials / Free and public materials

*   [Writing an OS in Rust](https://os.phil-opp.com/) A blog series creating a small operating system in Rust

### Board support crates / Teensy

*   [`teensy4-rs`](https://github.com/mciantyre/teensy4-rs) Board Support crate for the \[Teensy 4.0]

### Driver crates / WIP

*   [DS3231 (⭐7)](https://github.com/wose/ds3231) - I2C - real-time clock
*   [DS3234 (⭐2k)](https://github.com/rust-embedded/wg/issues/39#issuecomment-375262785) - SPI - Real-time clock
*   [HX711 (⭐9)](https://github.com/DaneSlattery/hx711) - GPIO - An interrupt-based driver for the HX711 Load Cell Amplifier IC. no-std.

### Firmware projects / WIP

*   [air-gradient-pro-rs (⭐11)](https://github.com/jonlamb-gh/air-gradient-pro-rs): Bootloader, firmware, and CLI tools for the AirGradient PRO
*   [Card/IO ECG (⭐40)](https://github.com/card-io-ecg/card-io-fw): Firmware for a business-card-sized ECG device with Wifi connectivity
items.content_html:
Books, blogs, and training materials / Free and public materials

  • Writing an OS in Rust A blog series creating a small operating system in Rust

Board support crates / Teensy

  • teensy4-rs Board Support crate for the [Teensy 4.0]

Driver crates / WIP

  • DS3231 (⭐7) - I2C - real-time clock
  • DS3234 (⭐2k) - SPI - Real-time clock
  • HX711 (⭐9) - GPIO - An interrupt-based driver for the HX711 Load Cell Amplifier IC. no-std.

Firmware projects / WIP

  • air-gradient-pro-rs (⭐11): Bootloader, firmware, and CLI tools for the AirGradient PRO
  • Card/IO ECG (⭐40): Firmware for a business-card-sized ECG device with Wifi connectivity

items.title: Awesome Webxr
items.content_text:
### Development / Engines

*   [Needle](https://needle.tools/) - An engine and exporter for Blender and Unity.
    *   [Official Documentation](https://engine.needle.tools/docs/)
*   [Onirix Studio](https://www.onirix.com/) - A no-code editor for creating Web AR experiences in the browser. It emulates features of the WebXR if target device / browser is not compatible.
items.content_html:
Development / Engines

  • Needle - An engine and exporter for Blender and Unity.
    • Official Documentation
  • Onirix Studio - A no-code editor for creating Web AR experiences in the browser. It emulates features of the WebXR if target device / browser is not compatible.
